meanings.definition: Of or relating to a specialized field or area of study.
meanings.sent1: The specialistic course focused on advanced mathematics.
meanings.sent2: Her specialistic knowledge in biology helped her excel in her research.
meanings.sent3: The specialistic seminar on astrophysics was out of this world!
meanings.sent4: His specialistic skills in coding made him a computer wizard.
meanings.sent5: The specialistic training program was intense but rewarding.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a focus on a specific skill or expertise.
meanings.sent1: The specialistic training program honed her artistic abilities.
meanings.sent2: His specialistic approach to cooking made him a master chef.
meanings.sent3: The specialistic magician amazed the audience with his tricks.
meanings.sent4: Her specialistic talent in music was like magic to the ears.
meanings.sent5: The specialistic workshop provided valuable insights into photography.
